text.text_translated: *Wonder* is the first novel by RJ Palacio, who is from New York. On her website, she explains that the idea for the book came to her one day after she saw a girl who had a condition that affected her face. The book has been a bestseller in the United States and has already won several awards. Many schools are using it to start discussions about topics like bullying, friendship and what it feels like to be different. A film version is also being made, and many people are waiting eagerly to see what RJ Palacio will write next.
